snippet.title: [SMBX 2.0 Episode] Delightful Adventure Enhanced - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Delightful Adventure Enhanced is a REMASTER/REMAKE of an old episode i made in 2014; Mario & Luigi's Delightful Adventure.

This release aims to put the episode up to snuff to the smbx 2.0 tech, with better bosses, a ton of QUOL features and an actual story!

Get it here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1GdpQ8qUoXfKFkne4NoSjI83Zc40PKkHR/view?usp=drive_link
